# Shultz Bare-URFE v5.1: The Spectral Trace Lock

> **The 0.75 Invariant**: A derived Trace-Class identity ($4 \times 0.75 = 3$) forced by the projection of a 4D vacuum onto 3D space. 
> **The 0.78 Attractor**: The emergent physical clustering value ($S_8$) for late-time matter, representing the "Hover Effect" above the geometric floor.

- [TOPOLOGICAL_PROOF.md](/TOPOLOGICAL_PROOF.md): **The Symmetry-Based Derivation**. Provides the group-theoretic foundation for why the floor is exactly 0.75.
